name: Rundown Iron Sentry
author: Glowackos
description: A powerful iron tower that will go to great lengths to defend its territory.

name: Solid Iron Sentry
author: Glowackos
description: A powerful iron tower that will go to great lengths to defend its territory.

name: Modern Iron Sentry
author: Glowackos
description: A powerful iron tower that will go to great lengths to defend its territory.

name: Grab-o-Bot
author: cedi
description: When you think it looks very fragile, you're right. But its also a devastating machine.

name: Silver Knight
author: SirCoqalot.
description: Rare tower with a chance to turn lesser creeps into gold instantly. Gains additional gold for each kill and will do more damage the more gold you have.

name: Golden Queen
author: SirCoqalot.
description: Rare tower with a chance to turn lesser creeps into gold instantly. Gains additional gold for each kill and will do more damage the more gold you have.

name: Bronze Dragon Roost
author: cedi
description: The mechanical version of the other two dragon roosts.

name: Igloo
author: Boekie
description: This igloo emits an extreme amount of cold, slowing and stunning creeps around it.

name: Frozen Igloo
author: Boekie
description: This igloo emits an extreme amount of cold, slowing and stunning creeps around it.

name: Deep Frozen Igloo
author: Boekie
description: This igloo emits an extreme amount of cold, slowing and stunning creeps around it.

name: Frozen Well
author: Boekie
description: This frozen well emits an enormous amount of cold.

name: Tidewater Stream
author: cedi
description: Some people think the purling noise of a river is calming.

name: Ball Lightning Accelerator
author: cedi
description: This deadly thing was invented by the dwarves to aid them in the long war against the orcs. However they never ended up using it, as it consumes far too much energy.

name: Electric Death
author: cedi
description: This deadly thing was invented by the dwarves to aid them in the long war against the orcs. However they never ended up using it, as it consumes far too much energy.The second generation can be the end of the world...

name: Genis Sage
author: i_m0ck_death
description: Powerful mage who is adept in using the water magics.

name: Gatling Gun
author: Boekie
description: A very powerful gun created by the dwarves. It has a chance to fire a burst of projectiles.

name: Xeno Research Facility
author: Palandu
description: Empowers you against the alien menace. Model credits: SirCoqaLot plus mOck and MasterCassim.

name: Solar Collector
author: Boekie/D1000
description: A tower which transforms solar-energy in to pure force.

name: Solar Conductor
author: Boekie/D1001
description: A tower which transforms solar-energy in to pure force.

name: Marine
author: Boekie
description: A highly esteemed footsoldier with low self esteem.

name: Experienced Marine
author: Boekie
description: A highly esteemed footsoldier with moderate self esteem.

name: Fisherman
author: cedi
description: Am I a man? So can I be called fisherman?

name: Taita, The Hermit
author: DaveMatthews
description: Standing on a snowy peak, he's watched the world below for decades.

name: Bomb Turret
author: DaveMatthews
description: Can fire different bombs for a great versatility.

name: Grand Bomb Turret
author: DaveMatthews
description: Can fire different bombs for a great versatility.

description: Wanders in the cold northern lands, looking for preys.

name: Valor
author: cedi
description: A truly inspiring sight.

name: Sea Turtle

description: Become one with water. Become a turtle.

author: i_m0ck_death

author: i_m0ck_death

name: Chilled Spire

description: Advanced frost tower that will freeze attacked creeps, stunning them and reducing their health regeneration.

author: SirCoqalot.

name: Ymir
author: IamanEvilMan
description: From the flesh of Ymir, king of the Jötanr, gods fashioned the mortal realms. Born of venom dripped into the frozen waters of Elivágar, Ymir was exiled to the lonely wastes of Ginnungagap where he mastered Icy powers.

name: Goblin Stronghold
author: cedi
description: You should always consider goblin-made items to be a nuclear weapon with a faulty trigger, you just might live to see another day.

name: The Steam Engine
author: Glowackos/cedi
description: One of the greatest inventions of the dwarves.

name: Particle Accelerator
author: the_red_terror
description: Gains a lot of speed and damage on each attack, while losing the bonus on kill.

author: the_red_terror
description: Gains a lot of speed and damage on each attack, while losing the bonus on kill.

author: the_red_terror
description: Gains a lot of speed and damage on each attack, while losing the bonus on kill.
